tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE financial_markets ( 
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, 
    stock_symbol VARCHAR(50), 
    date DATE, 
    closing_price DECIMAL(10, 2), 
    volume INT, 
    trend_analysis TEXT 
);

CREATE TABLE historical_stock_prices (
    stock_symbol VARCHAR(10) PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE NOT NULL,
    open_price DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    close_price DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
    volume INT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE trend_analysis (
    analysis_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    stock_symbol VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
    trend VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    confidence_level DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL,
    analysis_date DATE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Historical_Stock_Data (
  stock_id INT NOT NULL,
  date DATE NOT NULL,
  closing_price DECIMAL NOT NULL,
  volume INT NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (stock_id, date)
)

CREATE TABLE Market_Trends (
  trend_id INT NOT NULL,
  trend_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE NOT NULL,
  end_date DATE NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (trend_id)
)

CREATE TABLE Predictions (
  prediction_id INT NOT NULL,
  stock_id INT NOT NULL,
  trend_id INT NOT NULL,
  prediction_date DATE NOT NULL,
  predicted_value DECIMAL NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (prediction_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (stock_id) REFERENCES Historical_Stock_Data(stock_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (trend_id) REFERENCES Market_Trends(trend_id)
)

CREATE TABLE historical_stock_prices (
    symbol STRING PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    open DECIMAL,
    high DECIMAL,
    low DECIMAL,
    close DECIMAL,
    volume INT
)

CREATE TABLE financial_reports (
    report_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    symbol STRING,
    report_date DATE,
    revenue DECIMAL,
    expenses DECIMAL,
    net_income DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE market_trends (
    trend_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    trend_name VARCHAR(50),
    description TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE prediction_models (
    model_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    model_name VARCHAR(50),
    description TEXT,
    accuracy DECIMAL,
    train_date DATE,
    last_update DATE
)

CREATE TABLE financial_instruments (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    instrument_name VARCHAR(255),
    asset_class VARCHAR(100),
    tick_size DECIMAL(10, 2),
    market_cap DECIMAL(20, 2),
    volatility DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE market_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    instrument_id INT,
    date DATE,
    open_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    close_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    high_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    low_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    volume INT
);

CREATE TABLE historical_trends (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    trend_name VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    significance_level INT
);
